feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.45
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add tests to ensure date sorting works, and you can't bulk import dates in an invalid format. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15358
  • Type fetch data usages by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15363
  • Convert curl.spec.js and openapi2.spec.js to TypeScript by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15378
  • Convert last few .js files in backend-core to .ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15375
  • fix column names with spaces for relationship columns by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15379

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.44...3.2.45

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.46
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • BindingPanel typing improvements by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15372
  • Fix AI column licensing in UI by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15388

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.45...3.2.46

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.47
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • BBUI TS scaffolding + helpers conversion by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15385
  • Convert viewBuilder.spec.js to ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15382
  • Typing some components and returning 404 for views not found by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15384
  • Remove old migration system. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15373
  • Extract automation step definitions out into shared-core. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15383
  • login platform user after forced password reset by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15406
  • Redirect to account page for account password reset by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15404

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.46...3.2.47

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • JS console log support by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15402
  • Aligning the way that tableselector and datasourceselector display by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15413

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.47...3.3.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve typing around automations and automation testing by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15407
  • Fix an issue that broke creating new table screen modal by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15422

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.3.0...3.3.1
